statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT product_name, material_used FROM sustainable_materials;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials WHERE material_used = 'recycled' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, material_used FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, material_used, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_materials WHERE material_used LIKE '%wood%';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_materials WHERE sustainability_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM sustainable_materials ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, material_used FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, material_used FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_standards WHERE criteria LIKE '%environmentally%';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM sustainability_standards ORDER BY standard_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE environmentally_friendly = True;
SELECT product_name, material_used FROM products WHERE material_used = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, environmentally_friendly FROM products WHERE environmentally_friendly = False;
SELECT product_id, product_name, material_used FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, material FROM products WHERE material = 'Wood';
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT name, material, sustainability_rating FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material = materials.name;

SELECT name AS product_name, materials.name AS material_name FROM products JOIN product_materials ON products.product_id = product_materials.product_id JOIN materials ON materials.material_id = product_materials.material_id;
SELECT name, material FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT name, material, sustainability_rating FROM products p INNER JOIN product_materials pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id INNER JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id ORDER BY p.product_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT name, material, sustainability_rating FROM products p INNER JOIN product_materials pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id INNER JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id WHERE p.name LIKE 'S%' AND m.sustainability_rating > 3;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, m.name AS material_name FROM products p, materials m, product_materials pm WHERE p.product_id = pm.product_id AND m.material_id = pm.material_id ORDER BY p.product_id ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT p.name AS product_name, m.name AS material_name FROM products p INNER JOIN product_materials pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id INNER JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id WHERE p.name <> 'Chair' AND m.sustainability_rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@domain.com';
SELECT review_id, review_description, review_rating FROM product_reviews WHERE review_rating = 5;
SELECT product_name, material_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;

SELECT product_name, product_description, product_reviews.review_rating FROM products JOIN product_reviews ON products.product_id = product_reviews.product_id WHERE product_reviews.review_rating >= 4;

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.customer_email, products.product_name FROM customers JOIN product_reviews ON customers.customer_id = product_reviews.customer_id JOIN products ON product_reviews.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT products.product_name, materials.material_name FROM products JOIN materials ON products.material_id = materials.material_id ORDER BY products.product_name ASC, materials.material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT name, description, created_at FROM Products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM Products WHERE material_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM Materials WHERE sustainable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM Products WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, m.name AS material_name, pm.quantity FROM Products p JOIN ProductMaterials pm ON p.id = pm.product_id JOIN Materials m ON pm.material_id = m.id WHERE pm.quantity > 10;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(pc.product_id) AS num_products FROM Certifications c LEFT JOIN ProductCertifications pc ON c.id = pc.certification_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.name AS supplier_name, s.contact_info FROM Products p JOIN ProductSuppliers ps ON p.id = ps.product_id JOIN Suppliers s ON ps.supplier_id = s.id WHERE s.rating > 3;
